posts.post_content:
T200 Fatima.  

One corner crease on an otherwise very respectable team photo including five HOFers.  Graded VG by Beckett.  See for yourself.

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t-party/13701/t200-philadelphia-american[/IMG]

Selling today for SOLD with free shipping, yes free shipping.  Did I mention free shipping in this listing?
Hey Frank, how much is the shipping?  😉

[quote name="chlankf" post=1843795]Hey Frank, how much is the shipping?  😉[/QUOTE]

$15 to the Des Moines metro area.

$OLD

Today only

At least until Sunday

Still have one in stock.

[quote name="Fred" post=1852589]Is it still free shipping?  :p[/QUOTE]

Gosh Fred, i may have to enclose a $10 bill in the package in case you need to ship it back.  I thought about pursuing all 16 of these cards, but I didn't.  I wouldn't live long enough to sell them had I.:eek:
